short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Makes all tweets from caroline appear upside down

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This plugin works on Twitter.com, it looks for all the tweets from Caroline van der Plas and every time a user comes across a tweet from her, it flips the tweet upside down. 

This plugin is just a joke, because she was pushing farmers to put the Dutch flag upside down. It only adds a small CSS rule to every tweet for which the user is caroline van der plas, this css flips her entire tweet 180 degrees.
